Actions.Name: Add a new group
Actions.Description: Adds a new group to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add a new member
Actions.Description: Creates a member that has not yet been linked with an existing user.

Actions.Description: Adds a new milestone to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add a new project
Actions.Description: Adds a new project to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add a task
Actions.Description: Adds a new task to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Add a new user to group
Actions.Description: Adds a new group membership to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Fetch a list of groups
Actions.Description: Fetches a list of groups belonging to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Fetch list of members
Actions.Description: Fetches the list of members belonging to a workspace.

Actions.Description: Fetches a list of milestones belonging to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Fetch a list of projects
Actions.Description: Fetches a list of projects belonging to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Fetch list of tasks
Actions.Description: Fetches a list of tasks belonging to a workspace.

Actions.Name: Get a group
Actions.Description: Gets a group from a workspace by ID.

Actions.Name: Get member
Actions.Description: Gets a member belonging to a workspace by ID.

Actions.Description: Gets a milestone from a workspace by ID.

Actions.Name: Get my profile information
Actions.Description: Returns the profile information of the logged in user.

Actions.Name: Get a project
Actions.Description: Gets a project from a workspace by ID.

Actions.Description: Removes a group membership from a workspace by ID.

Actions.Description: Removes a task from a workspace by ID.

Actions.Description: Updates a group from a workspace by ID.
